website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for featherweight basketball shoes that perfectly and comfortably support your feet both on and off the court, these killer kicks are a must-have.
pros: Textile tongue and suede upper shoe
cons: The extra-thick ankle support isn’t for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Size runs long
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have great traction on hardwood court and your feet feel secured, overall very good shoes. However the size runs long. All of my shoes Nike/Adidas/UA are size 10 but the Dame5 size 10 I ordered was longer. Returned it and got size 9.5 instead that fits perfectly like all my size 10. See attached 4 photos with various brand size10 Vs Dame5 size10 and one last photo with LebronWitness size10 Vs Dame5 size 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: GeroCzan

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, Trust!
customer_reviews.text: Cop these when they went on sale and couldn’t be more happy I bought them. I have wide feet so I went with my tradition adidas size. Some reviews said go 1/2 a size down but my adidas size worked for me. I just got spray protector cause you know all the haters be wanting to bless these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Finally found some okay-fitting shoes for 4E wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I always wear either 4E or 5E, and although these shoes aren't exactly wide enough, they are the best I've found. Comfortable, light weight, they don't feel as though they impede by ankle range of motion. I don't feel slower in them (like I have in a lot of high-tops/medium tops).
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Great traction for quick cuts
customer_reviews.text: The colorway's okay depending on your tastes I guess, but the traction is great and the Dame 5s are well regarded for guards. Runs slightly large coming from the KD line, but seems to be built for long and narrow feet. In addition to the minimal slippage, the ankle has a knitted sock like support that's super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and plush performance shoe I've had in a while. The padded webbing covering the inside of the shoe makes it feel premium. Ankle support is OK...wish it had a bit more. Only deducting one star due to the grip. If you play on indoor courts that aren't squeaky clean you'll be sliding around or wiping constantly
customer_reviews.author: bCHAN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, especially for wider feet. Order 1/2 size smaller than your Nike size.
customer_reviews.text: The Dame 5 is extremely comfortable. I knowingly ordered a half size smaller than my Nike size and they fit perfectly. Wider toebox/forefoot is good if you have wider feet, padding inside the ankle keeps the shoe snug in that area. Bounce cushion is plush enough to feel soft but still retain some court feet. If you need a lot of ankle support these might not be the right fit, the collar around the ankle is stretchy and the shoe more or less feels like a low. Overall a 4 star for me, I might give these 5 stars after more wear time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Uncomfortable Shoes / Damaged Box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really narrow and provide no room for flexibility due to the support side piece. I'm 6'2, 215 center/forward and am have worn KD, Harden, Kobes. These shoes are uncomfortable right from the start. Also seller displayed inaccurate delivery date, it was late 3 days and the box showed up damaged. Do not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes look slightly different in person
customer_reviews.text: My son liked these bit was disappointed that they look a little different in person. The soles of the shoes are clear with black speckled and have strange writing on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Dame 5's to play indoor only about 5 times now and really like them. They have great grip/traction and if you lace thru the top eyelet they have great lockdown. Also they look super cool, I'm debating getting another pair just for every day. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, stylish, and good price
customer_reviews.text: I had Dame 3's before I got these, and these are wayyyy more comfortable. Especially the fit around the ankle. They provide a good amount of support and are tough to tip over, which is safe for your ankles, while being relatively cheap and very stylish. Way to go Dame!
customer_reviews.author: John Paige

customer_reviews.title: They were for my son...
customer_reviews.text: they were for my son... they fit properly, he likes them... that's all that mattered to me.
customer_reviews.author: Thom H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs tight for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great shoe without a doubt and it offers good comfort and stability. I decided to pull the trigger on these since I read that they good for both outdoor/concrete and indoor play. I am usually a size 9/9.5 which is what I ordered but I have wide feet so it was just too tight on the sides which sucks because it was a perfect fit otherwise. I thought I would break into them but after trying endlessly I had to return them. If you have wide feet I suggest ordering at least a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and comfortable, good ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great, especially good value, I would buy it again. The only downside is the tongue does keep slipping down and then gets a bit out of whack...but it's not a terrible issue, just mildly annoying - doesn't really affect it's funcionality. I'm in my mid 30's and still play basketball 3-4 times a week, and they've worked great - good traction, very comfortable - they are fairly thick around the ankles, but it's soft and comfy - but if you want something super lightweight, then these aren't for you.
customer_reviews.author: latkins84

customer_reviews.title: Really cool shoes with great cushion!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look really awesome! They have extra padding in the heel area which makes them fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: LexRose

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Feel, and Support, Lacks Grip
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they have wonderful support for your arches and they fit snug on your ankles. The only flaw I think they have is the grip when playing indoor ball. I don't know if mine are worn out from playing outside so when I play indoor they tend to be slippery, but even when they were new they could have used a bit more grip. Overall though, great product. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.text: Love them, would be better if wide sizes were avalible
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive, and fast!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loves this shoe! She says it’s supper fast and comfortable. She is an AAU basketball player who needs a supportive but light weight shoe...the Dame 5 delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Jason  Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Son loves the colors.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They are a little bright for my taste but he is very happy. Comfortable. Wearing well. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13 but with this I went a size up and I was right. Fits snuggly perfectly. Grips well too.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes for a fat dude
customer_reviews.text: These are possibly the most comfortable basketball shoes I've ever had, Im a big dude over 6ft 2 over 350 and it is beyond hard to find comfortable shoes so I've ordered 2 pair now. They have held up well for 4 months and I play ball 3-4 times a week. They're wide and fit my foot very well you may want to get a 1/2 size smaller for regular feet. I can not recommend these shoes more!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best Bball Shoe for Flat Feet
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of research, we bought them for our daughter who is an avid basketball player but has flat feet. After trying a handful of different shoes, the Dame 5 is the most comfortable & pain-free basketball shoe we have found so far that support her flat feet. I think we found "her shoe" for the rest of her basketball career.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S. Fellenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, little narrow from the box for wider foot players
customer_reviews.text: I listened Adidas customer service and ordered US 12.5 size for my 293 mm foot. Fits a bit tight at the beginning, but hose normal through time. Good shoes for my opinion. My foot is wide at the middle, so I'll recommend to buy half a size more for a wider foot
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and they look even better in person.
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off the purchase of these for a while. They are very comfortable, especially in the sole. Ankle support is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these shoes. He states that it is comfortable and fits well. He likes bright colored shoes. Quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's not used!
customer_reviews.text: Came used! I purchased these new shoes and it appears that the front of them has a scarf that has been warned by someone who may be returned them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Like the look but is a little wide at the front area Love the color
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Made my grandson happy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted these shoes, he is very happy with them, for good he loves the look.
customer_reviews.author: fifthsign

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it's suppose to and has done a lot of good!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes might not look the best but they perform amazingly well, I work at a hospital so I travel quick the number of miles per day and these get me through the day very well. They've prevented some slips and track well when running. Thanks for the amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: anthony.bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. He is a size 15-15.5 and the 15 fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SharAK

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and are great for playing basketball it. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for great basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Unaminous

customer_reviews.title: Needs more flexibility
customer_reviews.text: When I put it on i was expecting comfort but as a size 14 I had to tie it down pretty hard to make it stay put and not feel like its coming right off. The style is 10/10 however and I love the design in and out. I just kinda expected a play ball type not walk around casual type when it comes to the feel and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worst quality and no warranty whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worst quality and no customer service from adidas. Very disappointed by adidas refusal to stand behind their product. By the way, this is only after 3 months of very minimal use. Total waste of money. I’ll stick with Nike, they have better quality and actual customer service
customer_reviews.author: rashmi amlani

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I thought they were a little big at first but, when i hit the court i was in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Victormartel29

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color way. Very comfy. Lots of compliments. Got em when they were on sale. So all around nice experience.
customer_reviews.author: Steck

customer_reviews.title: Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them..
customer_reviews.author: reign h.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first if they was even real, but I decided to take the risk and I'm glad that I did! They ARE the real deal and they are amazing. I'm very happy and highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and popular
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it so much for this birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Nhien Truong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic performer
customer_reviews.text: Traction is amazing, comfort is great. Run a little long like most Adidas basketball models. Go a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Sizing runs LARGE! Nike I wear 10.5. Adidas= 10.0 is almost too big!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, they are comfortable, sleek and stylish. I love DAME! Go #RipCity!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for PG’s
customer_reviews.text: Love them! had that Drose feel on them for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: JG.F.AV

customer_reviews.title: Defective Basketball shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This first shoe was defective and ripped after 30 days. Also, the A-Z said after 90 days and you want to reject my refund!
customer_reviews.author: Tookie

customer_reviews.title: 12yo Loves em
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12yo son. The color pallet is a little strange for my tastes but he absolutely loves them. He’s only worn them for a week. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Quayle

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Didn't need to "break" them in. Great ankle support. And the kid thinks they look "cool".
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: After 3 fail attempts trying to get shoes thru Adidas. Was very happy to get the right ones in 2 days. My son is very happy he finally has his shoes that fit great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use the Dame 5 as my second basketball shoes in rotation and they are very comfortable. You need to use the shoes a couple of times to get good traction. They run half a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: It’s meant for your size. Perfect comfort not to tight not to loose. They are good for indoor or outdoor courts. Honestly one of my favorite sneakers right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Length important only when width is correct.
customer_reviews.text: The ordering wasn’t too specific about width, and clearly wasn’t what I thought I ordered. Too narrow...too narrow... Not easy to see options during ordering process.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, white part turned grey
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Fits great. Only thing is the white part is a soft leather and absorbed all the dirt from outside and the white part turned grey the first day..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for shoes for work. Am on a concrete floor all day walking or standing. These shoes work wonderfully, there is also padding around ankle to help stablize. Great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Brion

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, comfortable, they have good traction, and they look sweet too
customer_reviews.author: 😏😐😖

customer_reviews.title: Help me play outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying playing with these shoes, they fit snug but not too tight if you buy them in the right size and pla great outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoe design, really look great. Delivery was fast. One thing I would note is the shoes fit narrow, if you have wider feet maybe go with a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe on and off the court
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and good performance on the court. Runs a bit tight but just make sure to lace up with your feet in them to get the right fit
customer_reviews.author: Joey Tavera

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Order a half size smaller than you usually wear
customer_reviews.text: Second Dame shoe I’ve ordered in my sizeonly to have it arrive and it be 1/2 - to a whole size too large.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Got Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes received when on time. My son loves the style & fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traction gets better each wear! Just wait for it!
customer_reviews.text: The comfort straight out of the box was great. It will take a couple of wears but the traction gets better each time. I love this shoe. I have a wider foot so I plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, on court only, says best shoes he's played in!
customer_reviews.author: Deaha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive whether workin’ or ballin’!
customer_reviews.text: They hug my feet gently but firmly for all day comfort at work and also provide stability and support for play at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Erke

customer_reviews.title: I like it like that :)
customer_reviews.text: I like it. First day it arrived I tried already. I’m happy for my purchase and it arrived early too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto P. ng QC

customer_reviews.title: Dame Lillard Basketball shoe is on point!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking basketball shoe with excellent grip and light weight feel plus decent ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Owillsowell

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes great for playing basketball and supports feet 🦶
customer_reviews.author: Ryan labella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, comfort and how light the shoes feel. Breathable and your feet don’t overheat
customer_reviews.author: rM1234

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Excellent fit and very comfortable. Best shoes of Dame series yet.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Doten-Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought for son and he likes everything about the shoe. I liked the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great, my daughter loves them but they were a bit large
customer_reviews.author: Maze

customer_reviews.title: Top tier basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe. Well built and everything I was hoping for it to be.
customer_reviews.author: David Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Order it half size smaller. I did it and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for hooping. Very comfortable, supportive, and durable. Great traction even for dusty courts. The mid top provides ankle support which was a deciding factor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Demming

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good item. The grip needs to be broken in. But overall great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aguayo

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Dame 5
product_meta.description: Play low and fast with Dame style. These basketball shoes are built with a soft suede upper, and feature internal pods along the midfoot and under the tongue for exceptional comfort. A Bounce midsole gives the shoes lightweight cushioning, and a midfoot banking barrier provides lateral stability for quick changes of direction. A herringbone outsole offers great traction.
feature_bullets: Internal padded pods along midfoot and under tongue provide extra comfort.
Flexible Bounce midsole provides lightweight cushioning.
